name: @clayui/charts
description: React.js wrapper for D3 and billboard.js

scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir lib/cjs --extensions .ts,.tsx
scripts.build:esm: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir lib/esm --extensions .ts,.tsx --env-name esm
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn sass && yarn build && yarn buildTypes && yarn copySvg
